thread.title: Ronald Wayne explains how Steve Jobs got Atari to send him to India - Business Insider
thread.title_full: Ronald Wayne explains how Steve Jobs got Atari to send him to India - Business Insider

author: Darren Weaver
title: Ronald Wayne explains how Steve Jobs got Atari to send him to India - Business Insider
text:
embed 
In the mid-1970's, Steve Jobs made a pilgrimage to India with the help of Atari CEO and founder, Nolan Bushnell. Apple co-founder and author of " Adventures of an Apple Founder " Ronald Wayne explains how Jobs was able to parlay a work trip for Atari into his famous spiritual quest to India.
